content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: Enable path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/monitoring/v2/stacks/{stack_id}/enable content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum enable all monitors
responses
title: 14_Monitors_Enable_78.json
